participant_1.background:
I have a powerful computer that can handle both the demands of wedding cake design and music production.
I play the guitar to accompany my singing.
i m allergic to lactose.
I enjoy capturing the beauty of Pittsburgh through my camera.
i went to college.

participant_2.background:
I fear being judged for my physical appearance.
I play the flute to bring peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
I'm feeling good about my health and my dogs are my best friends.
i m a older woman.
My home is my sanctuary, a place where I can relax and be myself.

content.text: I am doing well! How are you?
I am doing well too. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play the flute. It brings peace and tranquility to my surroundings.
That's wonderful! I play the guitar to accompany my singing.
That's great! What kind of music do you like to play?
I love to play country music. What about you?
I love to play classical music. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
That's great! I love classical music too!
I'm glad to hear that! We can have a jam session together sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to!
Great! We can exchange contact information and set up a time to play.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it!
